question: Which of the following statement is INCORRECT?
choices: Bond length of <katex>$O_{2}$</katex> < Bond length of <katex>$O_{2}^{2-}$</katex>
Bond order of <katex>$O_{2}=$</katex> Bond order of <katex>$O_{2}^{2}$</katex>
Bond length of <katex>$O_{2}>$</katex> Bond length of <katex>$O_{2}^{2+}$</katex>
Bond order of <katex>$O_{2}^{+}$</katex> < Bond order of <katex>$O_{2}^{2-}$</katex>
explanation: Statement D says BO of <katex>$O_2^+$</katex> (2.5) < BO of <katex>$O_2^{2-}$</katex> (1). This is **Incorrect**.
(Note: Statement B is also incorrect as stated in text, but D is the answer provided in the key).
